   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to Mordor Labs
======================

Cloud Templates and scripts to deploy network environments **exclusively** to generate datasets for the `Mordor project <https://mordordatasets.com>`_.

Liability / Responsible Usage
#############################

This content is **ONLY** to be used to create research opportunities and generate datasets for the `Mordor project <https://mordordatasets.com>`_.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Environments:

   ATT&CK Evals <environments/attack_evals>
   Windows <environments/windows>
